about_us.title: About us
about_us.description:
We are a company committed to providing solutions for the industrial sector of power conducting wires and cables, with equipment and services that ensure the efficiency and continuity of your operations.

With decades of experience in the market, we manufacture high-performance equipment to meet customized demands of power conductor cable manufacturers. Our operations extend beyond national borders, with contracts established in countries such as Chile, Argentina, and Spain, consolidating our international presence.

Our commitment goes beyond manufacturing. We offer technical support and specialized maintenance, ensuring that your equipment is always in full operation, minimizing downtime and maximizing your business productivity. We know that each industry has unique challenges, and that's why we develop customized solutions that meet the specific needs of each client, whether in the national or international market.

our_departments.title: Our departments
our_departments.engineering_description: Our engineering department is responsible for developing innovative solutions, designing equipment and systems that meet the specific needs of each client, ensuring high efficiency and quality.
our_departments.machining_description:
Our Machining department is dedicated to manufacturing high-precision parts, using CNC machining centers, CNC lathes, conventional machines, and state-of-the-art equipment. We cater to small demands as well as complex and custom projects, always focusing on quality, efficiency, and strict deadlines.

Our expertise ensures solutions that meet the highest requirements, from development to final production, with special attention to details and finishes.
our_departments.assembly_description:
We integrate mechanical and electronic components, delivering complete and customized systems.

Our qualified team performs assemblies of highly complex devices, machines, and equipment, always ensuring perfect interaction between components. We ensure that each delivered solution operates efficiently, safely, and within the technical standards required by the market.

torcedeira_rigida.title: Rigid Strander
torcedeira_rigida.description:
This equipment can contain modules (cages) with 6 bobbins, 12 bobbins, 18 bobbins, and others upon request.

This machine was developed for twisting copper and aluminum wires or cables using standardized bobbins with a diameter of 630mm arranged linearly on the main axis in parts called cages.

We have a twisting line composed of three stages, a unit with six bobbins, a unit with twelve bobbins, and one with eighteen bobbins, and others upon request.
Suitable for both cable formation and shielding.

buncher_630_1800.title: Buncher's 630 - 1800
buncher_630_1800.description:
Buncher's are double twist machines for manufacturing copper and aluminum conductor cables, with high performance and power ranging from 20KW to 180KW, with linear speeds of up to 300m/min and twists of 5000T/min according to the equipment.

We have Buncher 630, Buncher 800, Buncher 1000, Buncher 1250, Buncher 1600.

desenrolador_duplo.title: Double Pay-off B630/800/B1000/1250
desenrolador_duplo.description:
This motorized pay-off was developed to feed Buncher's and other equipment that require continuous supply, with controlled tension, of bare or insulated wires.

Its maximum speed is 300m/min, using standardized bobbins with diameters of 630mm-800mm, and diameters of 1000mm to 1250mm.

bobinador_desbobinador_portal.title: Gantry Take-up and Pay-off
bobinador_desbobinador_portal.description:
These gantry-type equipment were developed to accommodate a wide range of bobbins, where their structure moves automatically through motorized mechanical transmission, both for closing and for lifting and spreading the cable for the take-up type, being controlled simultaneously with the speed of the production line to be installed.

They are developed according to the needs of each client.

desenrolador_multiplo.title: Multiple Pay-off 6 Bobbins
desenrolador_multiplo.description:
This motorized pay-off was made to feed buncher's and other equipment that require continuous supply, with controlled tension, of bare or insulated wires.

This equipment accommodates multiple bobbins with diameters from 600mm to 800mm, its maximum linear speed is 300 m/min.

planetaria_1000.title: Planetary 1000
planetaria_1000.description: This planetary stranding line was developed to perform the stranding of aluminum cables for bobbins with a diameter of 1000mm.

multifilar_8_fios.title: 8-Wire Multiwire (TM8)
multifilar_8_fios.description:
The multiwire drawing line was developed for the production of copper wires for conductor cables, including flexible cables, automotive cables, battery cables, building installation cables, photovoltaic cables, data cables, special cables, among others.

The SUPICOM drawing line is composed of the Drawing unit, Annealer, and Take-up, a compact line, working in synchronism, using advanced and updated technology in the industrial market.

desenrolador_vergalhao.title: Rod Pay-off
desenrolador_vergalhao.description: Specialized pay-off for rods, designed to provide smooth and controlled unwinding of heavy materials such as metal rods.

enfitadeira.title: Taping Machine
enfitadeira.description: Machine designed to apply tapes precisely and efficiently to various types of cables and wires, ensuring proper protection and insulation.

aplicadores_de_linhas.title: Line Applicators
aplicadores_de_linhas.description: Specialized equipment for precise application of lines in cable production processes, ensuring proper alignment and tension.

puxadores.title: Capstans
puxadores.description: Traction and control system for cable production lines, offering precision in speed and tension control during the manufacturing process.

bobinadores.title: Take-ups
bobinadores.description: Equipment designed to wind cables and wires uniformly and controllably onto bobbins, ensuring efficient storage and transport.

desbobinadores.title: Pay-offs
desbobinadores.description: Specialized machines for unwinding cables and wires from bobbins in a controlled manner, feeding production lines or installation processes.

mono_torcao.title: Single Twist
mono_torcao.description: This machine was developed to provide single twist for cables or the assembly of multiple cables requiring twist, ensuring that the final diameter of the cables does not exceed 40 mm. Ideal for the production of flexible cables and the assembly of special cables. For more information, please contact us.

others.title: Other Equipment
others.description:
Supicom develops specialized equipment, such as:

- Roll Splitters
- 6 Respasse Lines
- Linear Tape Applicators with One or Two Heads
- Annealers
- Caterpillars

news.title: Highlights
news.subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest news

service.subtitle: Customized Industrial Solutions for your business
service.manufacturing_description: We provide specialized machines and equipment for manufacturing copper and aluminum wires and cables, including flexible, communication, control, battery, photovoltaic, data, special cables, and more.
service.rent_description: We offer rental of commercial and industrial machines and equipment without an operator, suitable for various needs.
service.maintenance_description: We provide maintenance and repair services for industrial machines, ensuring maximum efficiency and longevity of the equipment.
service.development_description: We develop customized industrial projects, from planning to execution, ensuring innovative and efficient solutions for your business.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Didn't find what you needed? Check out answers to some common questions.
faq.question_01_title: What industries does Supicom primarily serve?
faq.question_01_description: Supicom serves industries in the cable, conductor wire, and other metallurgy sectors that require high-performance equipment for their operations.
faq.question_02_description: We provide everything from custom equipment development and manufacturing to technical support, specialized maintenance, and personalized service to ensure maximum efficiency and longevity of our clients' equipment.
faq.question_03_title: Does Supicom serve clients outside of Brazil?
faq.question_03_description: Yes, we have an international presence with clients in countries such as Chile, Argentina, and Spain, solidifying our reputation beyond Brazil.
faq.question_04_title: What are the unique features of Supicomâ€™s products?
faq.question_04_description: Our products are developed with cutting-edge technology, designed for durability, efficiency, and customization to meet each client's specific needs. We also provide ongoing technical support.
faq.question_05_title: How can I request a quote?
faq.question_05_description: You can request a quote through our website by adding products to the quote request or by directly contacting us. A representative will get back to you with the necessary details.
faq.question_06_title: Does Supicom offer maintenance and support for the equipment?
faq.question_06_description: Yes, we provide specialized maintenance services and technical support to ensure that your equipment operates efficiently with minimal downtime.
faq.question_07_title: Can I customize equipment for my production line?
faq.question_07_description: Yes, our equipment can be tailored to meet the specific requirements of your operation, ensuring they are aligned with your production processes.

contact.description: Get in touch with us for support, send suggestions, or discuss partnerships. We are always ready to help.
